attributes.action: Public inquiry to stop fraudulent sub prime lenders repossessing your home
attributes.additional_details:
Before the ink has dried on the loan/mortgage agreement, the financially vulnerable are basically doomed by these preying sharks, whose only interest is repossession.  That is their 'business'.

I want the government to look into the shady way of how they operate, and therefore pass a bill outlawing these sub prime lenders.
